algorithm_technique: Iterative: Find the nodes before and after the reversal segment, then reverse the segment in place.
problem_summary_simple: Reverse a portion of a linked list between given positions.
problem_summary_technical: Locate start/end of sublist, reverse it, and reconnect to the main list.
key_insights: A dummy node simplifies handling reversals starting from the head.
Carefully identify the node before the reversal segment (`last_unswapped`) and the first node of the segment (`first_swapped`).
The reversal of the segment can be done using the standard iterative linked list reversal technique.
